original_text: No light from people's lamps will ever shine in the city again. Nobody will ever hear the happy voices of a man and a woman when they marry. Your traders were the most powerful people on the earth. You used your magic to deceive people from all nations. No light from people's lamps will ever shine in the city again. Nobody will ever hear the happy voices of a man and a woman when they marry. Your traders were the most powerful people on the earth. You used your magic to deceive people from all nations. No light from people's lamps will ever shine in the city again. Nobody will ever hear the happy voices of a man and a woman when they marry. Your traders were the most powerful people on the earth. You used your magic to deceive people from all nations. No light from people's lamps will ever shine in the city again.
korean_text: 등불 빛이 결코 다시 네 안에서 비치지 아니하고 신랑과 신부의 음성이 결코 다시 네 안에서 들리지 아니하리로다 너의 상인들은 땅의 왕족들이라 네 복술로 말미암아 만국이 미혹되었도다

sentences.original_text: No light from people's lamps will ever shine in the city again.
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들의 등불에서 나오는 빛이 다시는 도시에서 비추지 않을 것이다.

sentences.original_text: Nobody will ever hear the happy voices of a man and a woman
sentences.korean_translation: 아무도 남자와 여자의 즐거운 목소리를 결코 듣지 못할 것이다.

sentences.original_text: Your traders were the most powerful people on the earth.
sentences.korean_translation: 당신의 상인들은 지구상에서 가장 강력한 사람들이었다.

sentences.original_text: You used your magic to deceive people from all nations.
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 모든 민족의 사람들을 속이기 위해 마법을 사용했다.

sentences.original_text: No light from people's lamps will ever shine in the city again.
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들의 등불에서 나오는 빛이 다시는 도시에서 비추지 않을 것이다.
